headline: Applied AI Research Scientist
bio: I specialize in large-scale multimodal foundation models, vision-language pretraining, and representation learning.
I build and scale systems that connect visual and language understanding with strong transfer to real-world product settings.
My work spans efficient pretraining, embedding quality, and practical deployment of machine learning systems.
Across research and product environments, I prioritize methods that are scientifically grounded and operationally reliable.
I enjoy turning high-impact ideas into shipped systems that improve user-facing intelligence at scale.
